title: Blinding Lights
summary: "Blinding Lights" is a song by Canadian singer the Weeknd, released on November 29, 2019, through XO and Republic Records, as the second single from his fourth studio album, After Hours (2020).[4] It was written and produced by The Weeknd, Max Martin and Oscar Holter, with  Ahmad Balshe and Jason Quenneville receiving additional credits.[5][6]
